text: Harold Lederman (January 26, 1940 â€“ May 11, 2019) was an American professional boxing judge and analyst. He began his career as a boxing judge in 1967 and joined the cast of HBO World Championship Boxing in 1986. He stayed in this role until HBO dropped boxing in 2018. He was added to the International Boxing Hall of Fame in 2016. He was born in the Bronx, New York. He was a Columbia University graduate. Lederman died of cancer on May 11, 2019, at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Boxing broadcasters Category:Columbia University alumni Category:Deaths from cancer Category:HBO Category:People from the Bronx
title: Harold Lederman
